      • testCreateReplacementChipOriginalText

        public void testCreateReplacementChipOriginalText()

        Ensure the original text is always accurate, regardless of the type of email. The original text is used to determine where to display the chip span. If this test fails, it means some text that should be turned into one whole chip may behave unexpectedly.

        For example, a bug was seen where 

         "Android User"
        was converted to 
         Android User [android@example.com]
        where text inside [] is a chip.

      • testCreateTokenizedEntryForPhone

        public void testCreateTokenizedEntryForPhone()
